levels.description: After deployment, summons a Vanillawing: the Vanillawing can sow tiles; sowed tiles give allied units +40 ASPD; <Monoliths>, <Strange Ore Veins> and Machine enemies take 40% more damage from allies on sowed tiles; the Vanillawing can periodically give allied Operators on the field -25% Redeployment Time the next time they leave the field
